name: Ib - Kimi ga Asobi ni Kite Imasu (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
A short story about Ib visiting Garry and sharing a lovely moment with him.
Based on "Ib" a really popular survival horror game made with RPG Maker.

name: Touhou Bougetsushou ~ Tsuki no Inaba to Chijou no Inaba
nutshell:
A Cute and funny set of stories about two Rabbit Girl youkai - Reisen Udongein Inaba, Tewi Inaba and an Exiled Lunar Princess - Kaguya Houraisan along with Reisen's Master - Erin Yagokoto, and their everyday life in Eientei.

Reisen Udongein Inaba: A rabbit who abandoned her allies and fled from Moon. She looks up to Erin as her Master.
Tewi: An Earth rabbit who has lived a long time and has become a Yokai. She is supposed to bring good luck to anyone who meets her.
Kaguya Houraisan: A former Moon Princess who drank an elixir of Immortality and was banished for it. Now she is the Lady of Eientei.
Erin Yagokoro: A Pharmacist who lives in Eientei after fleeing from moon. Formerly in charge of Educating Kaguya.

It counts as an official entry in the Touhou series, the third in the interconnected Touhou Bougetsushou storyline, albeit semi-canon due to its comedic gag-manga nature and ZUN being only a supervisor and not the sole author.

name: Natural Born Idiots
nutshell: A story about Natural Born Idiots.

name: Kare wa Ima, Koi o Shite Iru.
nutshell:
"Now, he is in love". Collected short stories from the male point of view.

Mizuiro Hanabi
Kokuhaku
Ato Hitotsu
Bokura no Seiza

name: Nāgarāja
nutshell: Sur le monde règne d’une main de fer le Roi Dragon, dont le sang empoisonne les rivières. Pour y remédier, des jeunes filles lui sont offertes, conditionnées depuis leur naissance à ne servir que de sacrifice. Deux membres de la garde impériale partent enquêter sur des anomalies au sud de la région de Shuicheng. Seulement, ce qu’ils y trouvent apparaît être non pas humain, mais bien maléfique.

name: Ikenai Navigation
nutshell:
Mochizuki Mai always dreamed of a perfect boyfriend,
but finds difficulty because of her ‘unrealistic’ requirements.
She just can’t seem to find anyone on Earth who’s perfect! But what happens when someone out of the world shows up?
Someone from her cell phone to be exact! And what happens when this boy says “I like you!”? And what happens when Mai starts falling for him?!

name: Mirai Nikki x Hanako to Guuwa no Tera
My Mother Is Not Easy to Mess With
tags: Reincarnation,Time Travel,Historical,Long Strip,Romance,Isekai,Fantasy,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell:
Je me réveille heureuse d'être mère, mais il me faut gagner de l'argent pour élever mon enfant et trouver un père.
Il semble que la propriétaire de mon corps était un peu folle et est en butte aux harcèlemlents et insultes des gens du villages.
Mais je suis là maintenant, les choses vont changer !
(Résumé susceptible de changer)

name: Hina wa Mitsuiro no Koi ni Torawareru
nutshell: Shinobu is a very cute and somewhat shy Gay Youth, who falls madly in love with his best friend Kenji, who for his misfortune is heterosexual and is about to get married. With this sea of mixed feelings and overcome by sadness, Shinobu attends a Gay bar with the objective of finding some casual appointment with another Man who makes him forget the grief that happens with his unrequited love, in this place I met Kou a very handsome man who will change his life…

name: "So"
nutshell: 高校生の男の子と小学生の女の子

name: Your Empire
nutshell: Emperor Zhu Youjian wakes up one day to find out he was in the body of a foreign ruler ... ? At the time of every sunrise, the two monarchs switch bodies, guiding the two empires that would, historically, be crumbling within decades.

name: Suki ni Natta Doukyuusei wa Shuukatsu-sei Deshita
nutshell: The classmate she's interested in actually wants to die…?!

name: Gabai
nutshell: This is the story of a young boy, after being sent from Hiroshima to Saga (10 years after the second World War, in 1958) by his mom because of a lack of money, journeying to a faraway place, and living in conditions alien to him, definitely makes him miss home. Worse, he is not familiar with his grandmother and her ways too. But with his Gabai Granny, he will slowly discover with his growing pains, just how resourceful Granny is…

name: Otona no Koi wa Kojiraseru
nutshell: Yamamori Mari is the "Marilyn Monroe" of her company. Despite her provocative appearance that has given rise to rumors she's a man-eater, the young woman is actually timid and has nursed an unrequited love for one of her colleagues, Hirata. By chance, she ends with him as housemates and…

name: Love Riot
nutshell: Joey thought he can avoid fights by transferring to another school. But what he doesn't know is that by meeting Elaine for the first time, he'll experience what it's like to be in love with his enemy.

name: Combini de Kimi to no 5 fun kan
nutshell:
The Office Lady (OL-san), who looks forward to stopping by at the convenience store on the way home from work. And Shibasaki-kun, the poker-faced high school part-timer, who gets stirred up by OL-san for some reason. A heartwarming manga about two people who pass by each other at the convenience store!

Links:

Official Square Enix page
Author's Twitter: https://twitter.com/nozo717

name: Put Rings On
nutshell: A Detective is responsible for finding and protecting the legendary Lucky Arrow, a magical compass!. He has to keep it safe from the Phantom Thief -- a mysterious guy who seems to know him well. An enemies-to-lovers romance between a determined detective and a romantic but elusive phantom thief

name: Raku Mote
nutshell:
"Revenge is a dish best served cold."
3 years ago Tomoko confessed to her crush, but was rejected. On her way to the meeting point, she met a geeky guy who asked her to go out with him.
How will their story conclude?

name: Kigeki wa Koi de Shinkasuru
nutshell: Hane Hajime, who spends his life lazing around and being dependent on others, is twenty-two years old. One day, having lost his way, he wakes up in a blood-stained bed, with the lower half of his body in full view and his rear end stinging-not surprisingly because he’s serviced a pair of twins! The curtain rises on completely innocent Hane’s new lifestyle as it starts to head for trouble. While he’s taken aback by unique adults, he finds kindness… or perhaps it’s love.

name: Maji de Watashi ni Koi shinasai! After party!!
Kanchigai Love Factory
nutshell: Souta is in love with his kind and handsome boyfriend, Yoichi. And they're living together! Shout thought they could be in love forever, but it seems like Yoichi has been hiding something lately?! When he started to worry about, he saw a suspicious email...

name: Harry Potter - Starless (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Draco has a perfect life, everyone is jealous of him. However, there’s still something in his mind. This is a story about a dark night without the light from the stars.

name: Cage
nutshell: Older brother forces younger into a sexual relationship after their parents' death.

name: I Am a Hero in Ibaraki
nutshell:
Set in Ibaraki, our protagonist is oppressed at home by his in-law family, and constantly bullied at school by his former best friends. His only friend is his pet dog, Iggy, who was rescued just before he was about to be euthanized.
Can "unwanted pets" like them survive the ZQN panic…!?

name: Iron Masked Detective Gen
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Always in a drunken stupor, private investigator Gen Jumonji is a former police detective of the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department. He is a man who has given up on the pursuit of ordinary happiness, having been fitted with an iron mask that can never be taken off again. One day, he receives a request from his former teacher from his college days. A young man named Majiro Shirakami, the subject of a parapsychology study, was murdered in a locked room. In order to solve the case, Gen and his mentor visit the Shiragami family home in Nagano Prefecture, but the Shiragami family members are murdered one after another. ......? A masterpiece of suspense, a sequel to "Drunk Detective Iron Masked Cross"!

name: NASA
nutshell: A collection of 10 short stories spanning 12 chapters, NASA is representative of Naoki Urasawa's writing style prior to his success as an author of psychological thrillers.

name: Zhulong: Ice and Fire
nutshell:
Huian est parfaite dans tout ce qu'elle fait. Que ce soit le tir à l'arc, l'escrime, l'intellect, la beauté... elle a tout maîtrisé. Une chose qu'elle n'a pas, cependant, est le libre arbitre. Fiancée à l'héritier de la famille Yao, elle n'a d'autre choix que d'épouser un général froid, distant et insensible. Ayant atteint le poste de Zhulong, Yao Chenglei devrait former le couple parfait avec Huian. Cependant, aucun ne peut supporter l'autre.
Lorsque Huian est attaquée par une ancienne magie déterminée à la tuer à cause de sa lignée, Chenglei est entraîné dans ses problèmes. Pris dans une bataille sanglante entre démons, Huian doit découvrir le vrai sens de sa lignée tout en découvrant où Chenglei s'intègre dans sa vie. Démons, soif de pouvoir et romance dangereuse : le chemin vers Zhulong est trempé de sang.

name: Intimate Flower
nutshell: My name is Alicia・Esperanza・Cerulean・F・Louisa・Intimate Flower・The Second. Use that limited brain capacity of yours to remember this great name of yours truly.
